item.description:
Title
How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute Story - workshop
When

Details

How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute story.

Come and enjoy a 2 hour workshop on finding a story from your life experience with coaching and pointers on performance. Storytelling is a whole performance art unto itself. In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up and twisting balloon animals and how to mine your life experience to craft a story. Followed by an open mic opportunity to tell your story to an audience.

Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. Please arrive by 6:15 to sign in workshop begins at 6:30pm. Taught by professional massmouth tellers who may feature with a ten minute story at the open mic
Andrea Lovett; professional storyteller, performance coach, and story lover. http://andrealovett.b....
This workshop will focus on story games, theater exercises, finding stories and helping you craft an oral, personal narrative and perform it. Handouts will be provided. Class is invited to tell at the intimate open mic which follows the workshop.

NOV 29th

The cost is $20 for the workshop and you need to buy something ($5 minimum) at the venue for the open mic.

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute Story - workshop and Open mic
